mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lecture (title, description, link, date, instructor_id) VALUES (#{lectureTitle}, #{lectureDesc}, #{lectureLink}, #{lectureDate}, #{instructorId})
mapper.select: SELECT id AS lectureId, title AS lectureTitle, description AS lectureDesc, link AS lectureLink, date AS lectureDate, instructor_id AS instructorId FROM lecture WHERE date >= DATE(NOW()) ORDER BY date ASC
